alert.note: Alert for Allegany (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 25 at 11:59AM EDT until September 25 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...THE SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING FOR CENTRAL ALLEGANY... NORTHEASTERN MINERAL AND NORTH CENTRAL HAMPSHIRE COUNTIES WILL EXPIRE AT NOON EDT... The storm which prompted the warning has weakened below severe limits, and has exited the warned area. Therefore, the warning will be allowed to expire. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for western Maryland...and eastern West Virginia. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service Sterling Virginia.
